another solid remaster from nightdive ran into zero issues with the game itself had no crashes and performance was excellent  pros everything has been updated the models and textures new weapon animations and hands have now been added to all weapons some levels have had small changes made to them and others have a few new areas in them  my only problem is i have no one to play the coop with besides that its a solid 11 out of 10 for me buy it
